scenes.text: Welcome to the Work Shop. What would can I help you with?
What would you like to buy?

§lThese are the available AWT Kits at the Workshop.
§rAll Kits come with §6full stacks, §ra §6 Colored Shulker Box, and §6fully maxed Enchantments.
§r§lArmor Weapon Tool Kits:
§r1 Netherite Kit for 40,000 Moneyz
§r1 Diamond Kit for 20,000 Moneyz
§r1 Iron Kit for 10,000 Moneyz
§r1 Gold Kit for 5,000 Moneyz
§r1 Stone Kit for 3,000 Moneyz
§r1 Wood Kit for 2,000 Moneyz
